mapper.sql: resid, name, sex, phone, birthday, eduid, wyid, note, appendix, state, eid
mapper.insert: insert into resume (resid, name, sex, phone, birthday, eduid, wyid, note, appendix, state, eid) values (#{resid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eduid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note}, #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into resume
resid,
name,
sex,
phone,
birthday,
eduid,
wyid,
note,
appendix,
state,
eid,

mapper.update:
update resume
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
eduid = #{eduid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wyid = #{wyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note},
appendix = #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where resid = #{resid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update resume set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, eduid = #{eduid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wyid = #{wyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note}, appendix = #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where resid = #{resid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
